channel.title: Need help with one problem
channel.description: My problem is, the hitmark, even if I hit mage, range, or if I am being hitted with range or mage, it allways shows the melee icon, if anyone knows the fix, tell me :D

item.title: Need help with one problem
item.dc:creator: @dzertus dzertus
item.description:
@dzertus wrote:

It does, combaticon0,1 and 2, melee=0, range=1, mage=2, can you tell me what file to link them? I will search at the client, if I don’t find out I will check this thread again, thanks!
-omnee

Edit: could’t find out, all I found was the drawing of it (transparency and coordinaties) and nothing about melee/magic/range attacks :O!
If someone can help me with this tell me, I can reward you in my server after!

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with one problem
item.dc:creator: @Resent Resent
item.description:
@Resent wrote:

It’s in sprites, client sided. You’ll have to link the damage with the proper sprite. Before you even get to this, check your sprites folder and check to see if your client has magic and range hitmarks.

Read full topic
